name: CubeJump (AkiGames)
description:
CubeJump is my first game project. Its a simple Jump `n` Run where the player controls a red cube and the objective is to reach the end of the level before the timer runs out. You can only  run and jump on the pink plattforms, anything else results in a Game Over.

This game is still in its Alpha Version, so there will be a lot of changes coming up in the future.

I also started practicing with Blender to create my own assets.

I hope you´ll enjoy the game.

If you want you can give me feedback, or ideas for future updates.

Thank you for playing!!!

Your AkiGames
